title: 'Not the act of a friend': World leaders react to Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's self-styled "Liberation Day" riled global trading markets and drew frustrated responses from world leaders.

title: World leaders react to Trump's global tariffs
shortDescription: World leaders took aim at Donald Trump's 10% global tariff plan, saying the ones who will hurt are Americans.

title: Trump announces 10% global tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump plans to enact 10% tariffs on all countries' imports and reciprocal tariffs, and more for countries on "worst offenders" list.

title: 5 takeaways from Trump's massive tariffs that could escalate trade war
shortDescription: President Trump imposed sweeping tariffs Wednesday on all U.S. trading partners, plowing ahead on a risky economic strategy. Here are five takeaways.

title: Senate rebukes Trump on Canada tariffs
shortDescription: The Senate vote came after Trump implemented 10% across-the-board tariffs on imports and additional reciprocal tariffs on goods from 60 countries.

title: Musk sued for allegedly not paying canvassers during presidential election
shortDescription: A lawsuit against Elon Musk and his America PAC accuses them of failing to pay canvassers during the 2024 presidential election.

title: Elon Musk to stay until DOGE work 'complete,' White House says
shortDescription: The White House rebutted reports that Elon Musk would leave the administration before the end of his 130-day special government employee appointement.

title: US aircraft carrier heads to Middle East as Trump threatens Iran
shortDescription: A second U.S. aircraft carrier headed to the Middle East after President Donald Trump threatened to bomb Iran.

title: Trump announces 10% tariff on all imports, accelerating trade war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and his advisers landed on tariffs of at least 10% on imports, with nearly 60 countries and the EU facing even higher taxes.

title: Cory Booker eyed for 2028 White House Dem contender
shortDescription: Sen. Cory Booker possibly gave Democrats the moment they've been waiting for against President Donald Trump and his GOP congressional majorities.

title: Oliver Stone testifies in Congressional hearing
shortDescription: Filmmaker Oliver Stone testified on newly released documents in President John F. Kennedy's assassination, urging lawmakers to reopen the case.

title: GOP senator says he won't apologize after calling fired fed worker a 'clown'
shortDescription: GOP Sen. Jim Banks of Indiana says he won't apologize over his comments calling a fired federal worker "a clown" who "probably deserved" to lose his job.

title: Trump 'shall not take over Greenland,' Danish PM pledges
shortDescription: "The U.S. shall not take over Greenland. Greenland belongs to the Greenlanders," Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen said.

title: Trump HHS cuts staffing at World Trade Center Program
shortDescription: In February, the administration restored cuts to the World Trade Center Health Program's budget, but new staff cuts threaten the program.

title: Supreme Court could boost GOP effort to defund Planned Parenthood
shortDescription: If the Supreme Court sides with South Carolina, many GOP-led states are expected to likewise block Planned Parenthood from participating in Medicaid.

title: Watch live: President Trump announces tariffs plan
shortDescription: The president's long-awaiting tariff announcement is expected to kick-off at 4 p.m. ET

title: Democrats mock Musk over Wisconsin win: 3 takeaways
shortDescription: Democrats hold chin up after prevailing in Wisconsin's expensive Supreme Court race and doing better than expected in Florida's special election

title: Musk shelled out $20 million on election he 'expected to lose'
shortDescription: The world's richest man had gone all in, spending heavily and issuing dire warnings about what the outcome in Wisconsin could mean for Republicans.
